doSearch

private java.lang.Object doSearch(org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest request, java.util.Map params)
Compute a search request and build the results
Parameters:
request - The SearchRequest to compute
params - Search parameters
Returns:
A Map containing the search results

index

void index(java.util.Map options)
Indexes all searchable instances of the specified class. If call without arguments, index ALL searchable instances. Note: The indexRequestQueue is using the bulk API so it is optimized. Todo: should be used along with serializable IDs, but we have to deal with composite IDs beforehand
Parameters:
options - indexing options

index

void index(java.lang.Class domainClass)
An alias for index(class:[MyClass1, MyClass2])
Parameters:
domainClass - List of searchable class

index

void index(java.util.Collection instances)
Indexes domain class instances
Parameters:
instances - A Collection of searchable instances to index

index

void index(groovy.lang.GroovyObject instances)
Alias for index(Object instances)
Parameters:
instances

search

java.lang.Object search(java.util.Map params, groovy.lang.Closure query)
Global search using Query DSL builder.
Parameters:
params - Search parameters
closure - Query closure
Returns:
search results

search

java.lang.Object search(groovy.lang.Closure query, java.util.Map params = [:])
Alias for the search(Map params, Closure query) signature.
Parameters:
query - Query closure
params - Search parameters
Returns:
search results

search

java.lang.Object search(java.lang.String query, java.util.Map params = [:])
Global search with a text query.
Parameters:
query - The search query. Will be parsed by the Lucene Query Parser.
params - Search parameters
Returns:
A Map containing the search results

unindex

void unindex(java.util.Map options)
Unindexes all searchable instances of the specified class. If call without arguments, unindex ALL searchable instances. Note: The indexRequestQueue is using the bulk API so it is optimized. Todo: should be used along with serializable IDs, but we have to deal with composite IDs beforehand
Parameters:
options - indexing options

unindex

void unindex(java.lang.Class domainClass)
An alias for unindex(class:[MyClass1, MyClass2])
Parameters:
domainClass - List of searchable class

unindex

void unindex(java.util.Collection instances)
Unindexes domain class instances
Parameters:
instances - A Collection of searchable instances to index

unindex

void unindex(groovy.lang.GroovyObject instances)
Alias for unindex(Object instances)
Parameters:
instances
